body.para: On Tue, 15 Aug 2006, Oleg Nesterov wrote:

quote.quotepara: On Tue, 15 Aug 2006, Oleg Nesterov wrote:
task->pi_blocked_on != NULL, we hold task->pi_blocked_on->lock->wait_lock. Can it go away ?
That is correct. But does it make the code more readable?
Well, in my opinion - yes. But yes, it's only my personal feeling :)
When you read the code you shouldn't need to go into that kind of complicated arguments to see the correctness - unless the code can't be written otherwise.

body.para: It is even better if you can read the code without a comment. Good code doesn't need comments.
